00019 // the constructor
00020 RemapState::RemapState(QDomNode &remapNode): name_(QString()), remapPorts_() {
00021         for (int i = 0; i < remapNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00022 
00023                 QDomNode tempNode = remapNode.childNodes().at(i);
00024 
00025                 // get name
00026                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00027 
00028                         // strip all whitespace characters
00029                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00030                         name_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(name_);
00031                 }
00032 
00033                 // get remapPorts
00034                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:remapPorts")) {
00035 
00036                         // go through all the remapPorts
00037                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00038                                 QDomNode remapPortNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00039                                 remapPorts_.append(QSharedPointer<RemapPort>(
00040                                                 new RemapPort(remapPortNode)));
00041                         }
00042                 }
00043         }
00044 
00045         // if mandatory field is missing
00046         if (name_.isNull()) {
00047                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00048                                 "spirit:remapState"));
00049         }
00050         return;
00051 }
00052 
00053 RemapState::RemapState( const RemapState &other ):
00054 name_(other.name_),
00055 remapPorts_() {
00056 
00057         foreach (QSharedPointer<RemapPort> remapPort, other.remapPorts_) {
00058                 if (remapPort) {
00059                         QSharedPointer<RemapPort> copy = QSharedPointer<RemapPort>(
00060                                 new RemapPort(*remapPort.data()));
00061                         remapPorts_.append(copy);
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 RemapState & RemapState::operator=( const RemapState &other ) {
00067         if (this != &other) {
00068                 name_ = other.name_;
00069 
00070                 foreach (QSharedPointer<RemapPort> remapPort, other.remapPorts_) {
00071                         if (remapPort) {
00072                                 QSharedPointer<RemapPort> copy = QSharedPointer<RemapPort>(
00073                                         new RemapPort(*remapPort.data()));
00074                                 remapPorts_.append(copy);
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077         }
00078         return *this;
00079 }
00080 
00081 // the destructor
00082 RemapState::~RemapState() {
00083         remapPorts_.clear();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void RemapState::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00087         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:remapState");
00088 
00089         // if mandatory name is empty
00090         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00091                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00092                                 "spirit:remapState"));
00093         }
00094         else {
00095                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00096         }
00097         // if remapPorts exist
00098         if (remapPorts_.size() != 0) {
00099                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:remapPorts");
00100 
00101                 // tell remapPorts to write themselves
00102                 for (int i = 0; i < remapPorts_.size(); ++i) {
00103                         remapPorts_.at(i)->write(writer);
00104                 }
00105                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:remapPorts
00106         }
00107 
00108         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:remapState
00109         return;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void RemapState::setRemapPorts(const QList<QSharedPointer<RemapPort> > &remapPorts) {
00113         // delete the old remap ports
00114         remapPorts_.clear();
00115 
00116         // save the new remap ports
00117         remapPorts_ = remapPorts;
00118 }
00119 
00120 const QList<QSharedPointer<RemapPort> >& RemapState::getRemapPorts() {
00121         return remapPorts_;
00122 }

00124         name_ = name;

00128         return name_;
